name: Merge 10! - Woody Block Puzzle
description:
Put your skills to the test with Merge 10! - a minimalist puzzle game that will keep you wanting more!

Get points by dragging dice onto the board and getting a total of 10 in a row or column. Seems easy right? Give it a try now!

We really hope you enjoy it!
Easy to learn and fun to master gameplay.
This game is a sure treat for any puzzle lover.
Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age.
